entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023
